Title: Requires state agencies to expend funds no later than ninety days after receipt of a certificate of approval from the director of the budget
Summary: Requires state agencies to expend funds no later than ninety days after receipt of a certificate of approval from the director of the budget; reduces the budget of an agency that violates such requirement for the upcoming fiscal year by 1% of the amount of the late award.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring state agencies to expend funds no later than ninety days after receipt of a certificate of approval from the director of the budget
